alert.note: Alert for Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lake and north central Cook Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Northbrook, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Evanston, Skokie, Mount Prospect, Glenview, Wheeling, Northbrook, Highland Park, Wilmette, Lake Forest, Deerfield, Prospect Heights, Winnetka, Glencoe, Lincolnshire, Northfield, Highwood, Riverwoods, Kenilworth, Bannockburn and Golf. Including the following interstates... I-94 between mile markers 22 and 36. I-294 between mile markers 22 and 36. This includes... Northwestern University and Ravinia Music Festival. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
